title: cannot find run_spp.R
body:
Hi there,

I have tried to run the pipeline with test dataset, but there is an error which is from  RUN_SPP=`which run_spp.R`. I also tried to find this R file with 'find ./ -name "run_spp.R"' command but still cannot find it. I am not sure if this run_spp.R file is not generated in processing or is forgot to put under the corresponding directory. 

Any help will be appreciated.

Junhui

title: Can not find singularity images
body:
Hi there,

Just wondering if this repo is actively monitored? Where can I obtain a copy of the singularity images used in this repo?

Thanks very much!

--Kai

title: can not find getDESeqSF.r
body:
Hi there,

I am wondering where I can find R script getDESeqSF.r in this repo.

title: Not working with bam input if paired end
body: --bam option is not implemented in checkDesign.py
